EmailTemplate.description: Lead owner and partner contact should receive a notification one week before it expires and then again on the day that it expires.
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Lead Expiration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Lead Registration has Expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Partner_Contact__c},
Your lead registration for {!Lead.Name} has expired due to lack of activity updates.
If you are continuing to pursue this prospect, please register an opportunity.
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
